org.sql: SELECT work_packages.id FROM work_packages LEFT OUTER JOIN projects ON projects.id = work_packages.project_id LEFT OUTER JOIN relations ON relations.hierarchy <> "$1" AND relations.relates = "$2" AND relations.duplicates = "$3" AND relations.follows = "$4" AND relations.blocks = "$5" AND relations.includes = "$6" AND relations.requires = "$7" AND relations.to_id = work_packages.id LEFT OUTER JOIN work_packages AS ancestors_work_packages ON ancestors_work_packages.id = relations.from_id WHERE work_packages.id = "$8" ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT work_packages.id FROM work_packages LEFT OUTER JOIN projects ON projects.id = work_packages.project_id LEFT OUTER JOIN relations ON relations.hierarchy <> "$1" AND relations.relates = "$2" AND relations.duplicates = "$3" AND relations.follows = "$4" AND relations.blocks = "$5" AND relations.includes = "$6" AND relations.requires = "$7" AND relations.to_id = work_packages.id LEFT OUTER JOIN work_packages AS ancestors_work_packages ON ancestors_work_packages.id = relations.from_id WHERE work_packages.id = "$8" ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1
